I have the same in the VAB, that seems to be a bug in FAR. Open the debug menu (press Alt+F12), then show the input locks. It should say something like "FAREd" if you hover over that area. (Can't quite remember the exact name.) You should also see the buttons in the upper right corner (load, save, exit) getting disabled.

I am running into a problem with 1.5.x (.0 and .1) in the VAB. The Toolbar icon shows up (the "you need to configure this screen's toolbars" icon), and I don't see a good way to dismiss it. If I click on the icon, it tells me that I can configure Crew Manifest. Regardless of whether I do or not, the notification won't go away.

Once I start building, and I have a part that uses MechJeb, I can then configure the toolbars with an MJ page, and the notice goes away and the toolbar hides. However, if I start a new design, and my mouse goes near the toolbar menu region, the notification icon pops up *again*, and it won't go away on its own until I have added a MechJeb part to the ship.
